notes-1: To increase the chance of being featured, please ensure that your submissions meet our guidelines.
notes-2: We'll review your submission. If it gets selected, you will receive an email notification and your content will be featured in our search.
error-invalid-photo: Invalid photo. Please upload only supported images.
title: Title
photos-label: Add at least one photos. Items with photos get 5x more customers. Accepted formats are .jpg, .gif and .png.
boost-listing: Do you want to add listing booster to your listing? Listing booster makes your listing show up frequently on top of other listings for more attention.

package-x-days.one: Yes. I want this listing to frequently show on top for {{count}} day.
package-x-days.other: Yes. I want this listing to frequently show on top for {{count}} days.

error-select-booster: Please specify if you want a booster.
paypal-close-warning: Don't close until you get a successfull payment message.
tos-ag: By posting an ad, you agree to our terms of service.
how-to-create: How to create an effective ad
